name: TEXT_TEMPLATES
description: This table displays general information about text template (ETT) records, such as display name and record status (active, deleted, etc.).

columns.name: TEXTTEMPLATE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the template record.

columns.name: TEXTTEMPLATE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the text template.

columns.name: DISPLAY_NAME
columns.description: Display name for the text template.
